numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a group of students.
2. The students had a legacy boost.
3. The students had the highest chance of being admitted to an elite college.
5. Colleges place much emphasis on a student's legacy.
6. Colleges place much emphasis on a student's background.
7. Colleges place less emphasis on a student's grades.
8. Colleges place less emphasis on a student's test scores.
13. I also wonder about other roles in the college admissions process.
14. It feels that colleges place much emphasis on a student's background.
15. It feels that colleges place much emphasis on a student's legacy.
16. It feels that colleges place much emphasis on a student's lack of legacy.
